This encounter includes something ghostly or purely spiritual.
Ghosts or entities from other dimensions have obligations or passions that manifest them or keep them in the mortal world.
A Spectral threat might want to stay here or be released to its natural place. It may be frightened, angry, or confused.
You may be challenged by a Spectral threat if you can't interact with it, or if its otherworldly nature has dangerous effects. A Spectral threat may:
prompts: Pass selectively through solid matter or people
Wield morbid magics like chilling touch or possession
Ravenously pursue something the living have that it wants
